page.title: 13DAISY PARK GALA DAY
page.content: The Gala is organised by Mrs A. Thomson with the help of the Tuesday Club. It is usually held in Motherwell Stadium on a Saturday in August. In the Gala there are Sports, Majorette Displays, pony rides, home baking, soft goods and grocery sales. In the past any profit has gone to the Deaf Unit at Glencairn School. There is usually a float and fancy dress competition for two age groups. A Queen, a Handmaid and a Page-boy are chosen by lottery. There has been a Gala every year for the last six years but not this year, because the organisers decided to have a year off to see if they could involve any more of the young mothers, who ought then to be able to take over the running of the Gala.
